text:
文献来源：指定杂志（见附录）和 Web of Science（WOS）数据库（包
含 SCI 及扩展版、 SSCI、 CPCI、 CCR 及其扩展版几个重要数据库）近
十年的关键词分析，院校分析，作者分析。 这部分是一个总体描述，
目的是找出热词和大咖级学者， 发现主要研究热点。 在关键词分析的
基础上， 使用 citespace 分别对服务营销与价值共创、 数字营销与平台
trans:
Sources of Literature: The analysis draws from designated journals (listed in the appendix) and the Web of Science (WOS) database, which includes
key databases such as SCI and its extended version, SSCI, CPCI, and CCR along with their extensions. Over
the past decade, keyword analysis, institutional analysis, and author analysis are performed. This section provides an overall description
with the aim of identifying trending keywords and influential scholars, thereby uncovering major research hotspots. Based on the keyword analysis,
Citespace is used to examine topics such as: service marketing and value co-creation, digital marketing and platform
